roleset.name: pulse with increased pressure regularly
roleset.note: THROB-V NOTES: VN updated by Julia, 10/2010. Member of Vncls modes_of_being_with_motion-47.3, tingle-40.8.2 (from throb.01-v)

example.name: oh my throbbing head!
example.text: ...it was like the bandaged wound on the back of his head which-1 [*T*-1] occasionally throbbed; it was merely another part of his weakness.
example.arg: which -> the bandaged wound on the back of his head
